mapper.insert: insert into product (name, price, size, stock, info, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date) values (#{name}, #{price}, #{size}, #{stock}, #{info}, #{createdBy}, now(), #{updatedBy}, now())
insert into category (category_big, category_small, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date) values (#{bigCategory}, #{smallCategory}, #{createdBy}, now(), #{updatedBy}, now())
insert into product_images (product_id, images_url, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date) values (#{productId}, #{imagesUrl}, #{createdBy}, now(), #{updatedBy}, now())
insert into product_category (product_id, category_id, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date) values (#{productId}, #{categoryId}, #{createdBy}, now(), #{updatedBy}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT category_id FROM product_category WHERE product_id = #{productId};

SELECT A.product_id, A.name, A.price, A.size, A.stock, A.info, D.images_url, C.category_big, C.category_small FROM product AS A LEFT JOIN product_category AS B ON A.product_id = B.product_id LEFT JOIN category AS C ON B.category_id = C.category_id LEFT JOIN product_images AS D ON A.product_id = D.product_id ORDER BY product_id LIMIT #{pagination.limitStart}, #{recordSize}

select A.product_id, A.name, A.price, A.size, A.stock, A.info, D.images_url, C.category_big, C.category_small FROM product AS A LEFT JOIN product_category AS B ON A.product_id = B.product_id LEFT JOIN category AS C ON B.category_id = C.category_id LEFT JOIN product_images AS D ON A.product_id = D.product_id where A.product_id = #{productId}
mapper.delete: DELETE A, B, C, D FROM product AS A LEFT JOIN product_category AS B ON A.product_id = B.product_id LEFT JOIN category AS C ON B.category_id = C.category_id LEFT JOIN product_images AS D ON A.product_id = D.product_id WHERE A.product_id = #{productId}
